interests.title: Research Interests
interests.text: Currently interested at einforcement learning, world models, and AI societies,  how intelligent agents perceive, reason, and act through interaction and reflection, using machine learning to solve real-world problems.

about.title: About
about.text: Master's student in Machine Learning at University of Montreal / Mila. Enjoy categorizing things and finding connections between them.
